EmailTemplate.description: COMING SOON! Unlock new experiences for you consumers no cta
EmailTemplate.name: 01-06-22 BNK 62/64 Campaign Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Get ready! Next-gen cash recycling ATMs by NCR are coming
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ATMs have looked the same for decades. We’re about to change that. Our new range of cash recyclers turns traditional design on its head. They’re progressive, innovative and future-proof—everything you need your next ATM investment to be. Customers expect more from your technology. Here’s the chance to wow them. Coming January 2022. <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
